title: Introducing myself as a new player from another region
body:
Some days ago I've decided to give a try moving to another region.
As you can see I'm fron LAN and must that my mmr is platinum but many people tells that platinum is like silver here so I been thinking, why not to give it a try?

So, as I reach high levels to unlock all the runes, someone can tell me how to farm exp faster?

Oh, and I'm sure that I can find some nice players here :D

replies.body:
You'll probably get a lot more responses and views if you repost this over in Gameplay or General Discussion, but I did want to touch on how ranking changes when you transfer servers. 

Since you're playing with an entirely different group of players on a new server, you do need to be placed again to know where you stand with the new group. You'll generally only play one placement, with your old ranking/mmr factoring in a little.
